info.title: Beryl Core API
info.description: Central API Gateway and orchestration layer for BÃ©ryl ecosystem

schema.title: Response List Audit Events Api V1 Fintech Audit Events Get

post.description:
Predict demand for electric mobility at a location.

- **location**: Geographic location identifier
- **time_window**: hourly, daily, or weekly granularity
- **forecast_horizon**: Number of hours to forecast ahead

Optimize route for energy efficiency.

- **origin**: Starting location
- **destination**: Ending location
- **vehicle_type**: ebike, escooter, or ecar
- **battery_level**: Current battery percentage (optional)
- **max_time_minutes**: Maximum allowed travel time (optional)

Analyze fleet intelligence metrics.

- **fleet_id**: Fleet identifier (path parameter)
- **metrics**: Specific metrics to analyze (optional)

get.description:
Get real-time vehicle status.

- **vehicle_id**: Vehicle identifier (path parameter)

Predict maintenance needs for a vehicle.

- **vehicle_id**: Vehicle identifier (path parameter)

post.description:
Optimize vehicle distribution across target locations.

- **fleet_id**: Fleet identifier (path parameter)
- **target_locations**: Locations that need vehicles

Compute smart destination recommendation with backend AOQ decisioning.

- **query**: Destination typed by user
- **candidate_destinations**: Optional destination candidates
- **trip_history**: Optional destination history with usage count
- **travel_mode**: solo, family, or eco

Retrieve pedometer data for a user.

- **user_id**: User identifier
- **date_from**: Start date for data retrieval
- **date_to**: End date for data retrieval

Retrieve health profile - SENSITIVE DATA.

- **user_id**: User identifier

Calculate ESG score for a user.

- **user_id**: User identifier
- **period**: Calculation period (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly)

Get sustainability indicators for a user.

- **user_id**: User identifier

Get community impact metrics.

- **community_id**: Community identifier (path parameter)

get.description:
Get active health challenges for a user.

- **user_id**: User identifier (path parameter)

schema.title: Response Get Active Challenges Api V1 Esg Challenges  User Id  Active Get

post.description:
Get comprehensive wellbeing score for a user.

- **user_id**: User identifier

Generate ESG report for institutional reporting.

- **user_id**: User identifier
- **report_type**: Report type (standard, detailed, executive)

get.description:
Get personalized ESG and health insights.

- **user_id**: User identifier (path parameter)

Aggregates pedometer, health, ESG, and wellbeing data for comprehensive view.
